article.title: Wisconsin District Export Council Roster
article.summary: Learn more about the members and officers of the Wisconsin District Export Council.
article.content:
​

Officers

Chairman:Thomas GaglioneJP Morgan Chase

Vice-Chairwoman:Mary RegelBentley World Packaging

Treasurer:Jane DauffenbachAquarius Systems, a Division of D&D Products, Inc.

Executive Secretary:Damian FeltonU.S. Commercial Service Milwaukee

Steven BialekMilwaukee School of Engineering, Rader School of Business

Alan RuudRuud Lighting​
